Deprecated API

Contents

  • For Removal
  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods

  • For Removal 
    Element Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.util.Constants.ENABLE_THREADLOCALS
    use Constants.isThreadLocalsEnabled()
    org.apache.logging.log4j.util.Constants.IS_WEB_APP
    use Constants.isWebApp()
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.message.MessageFactory2
    MessageFactory now contains all interface methods.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.CleanableThreadContextMap
    use ThreadContextMap directly
    org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ObjectThreadContextMap
    use ThreadContextMap directly
    org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ThreadContextMap2
    use ThreadContextMap directly
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.message.AbstractMessageFactory
    MessageFactory has default methods that implement all the methods that were here.
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.util.Constants.ENABLE_THREADLOCALS
    use Constants.isThreadLocalsEnabled()
    org.apache.logging.log4j.util.Constants.IS_WEB_APP
    use Constants.isWebApp()
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.message.StructuredDataId.makeId​(String, int)
    Use StructuredDataId.makeId(String, String) instead
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.message.StructuredDataId​(String, int, String[], String[])
    Use StructuredDataId(String, String, String[], String[]) instead.
